questions.text: Pakistan established diplomatic relations with China in:
questions.explanation: Pakistan established diplomatic relations with the People's Republic of China in 1951.

questions.text: SEATO (Southeast Asia Treaty Organization) was dissolved in:
questions.explanation: SEATO was dissolved on June 30, 1977. Pakistan was a founding member.

questions.text: The Gwadar Port was built with assistance from:
questions.explanation: Gwadar Port was developed with Chinese assistance as part of CPEC.

questions.text: Pakistan is NOT a member of:
questions.explanation: Pakistan is not a member of ASEAN (Association of Southeast Asian Nations).

questions.text: The Karachi Agreement between Pakistan and Afghanistan was signed in:
questions.explanation: There has been no Karachi Agreement between Pakistan and Afghanistan; the Durand Line remains disputed.

questions.text: Pakistan joined the Commonwealth of Nations in:
questions.explanation: Pakistan became a member of the Commonwealth upon independence in 1947.

questions.text: The Agra Summit between India and Pakistan was held in:
questions.explanation: The Agra Summit was held in July 2001 between President Musharraf and PM Vajpayee.

questions.text: Pakistan was suspended from the Commonwealth in 1999 due to:
questions.explanation: Pakistan was suspended from the Commonwealth in 1999 following General Musharraf's military coup.

questions.text: The D-8 Organization for Economic Cooperation was founded in:
questions.explanation: D-8 was founded in 1997 in Istanbul. Pakistan is a founding member.

questions.text: Who proposed the concept of 'Strategic Depth' in Pakistan's foreign policy?
questions.explanation: The concept of 'Strategic Depth' regarding Afghanistan was developed by Pakistani military strategists in the 1980s.
